title: EximiousSoft Business Card Designer 3.80 + serial
description:
Business Card Designer - is a powerful yet simple software for creating business cards. With this software, you can make your own business cards, professional quality. The program supports export to image files with high resolution for printing and print maps directly to your printer. It is possible to add shadows, the settings for the figures, symbols and texts.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Provide more than hundreds of attractive business card templates. By which, you can only customize with your own texts and symbols to crate stunning cards.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Provide more than hundreds of background image, logoes, shapes, symbols,gradient styles. Which make your art work is so easy and quick.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports to export cards to image files with high quality for print shop and print cards from your own printer directly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Works like a greate image editor program that supports strongly layer-editing.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Vector objects such as shapes,symbols, texts, lines, curves can be filled with solid color, image, pattern and gradient colors high smoothly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Outlines of vector objects such as shapes, symbols,texts,lines,curves can be stroken with solid color, image, pattern and gradient colors high smoothly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Outlines of vector objects shch can be stroken with dash style.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ To create,move,resize or rotate layers/Objects only with draging or clicking mouse button. Which is so easy and visual.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports alpha blend completely. Each layer object is allowed to contain an alpha channel. An vector object can filled or storken with different transparency value.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Gives you the option to add shadows with customized settings to the shapes, symbols and texts on your business card.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize the width and height of your Business card to suit your requirements or pick a standard Business card size from the default size options available.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports to insert your own photograph to business cards and customize shape with Custom Shape Tool.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Has good interface and user friend designer tools.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Undo or redo anytime anywhere.
